slides.data: Socks? What the heck is that?
Simple: It's the partner of Shoes in presentations. It is a presentation tool for Shoes!
Now What the heck is Shoes?
res/shoes-icon.png
Well in simple terms: Shoes is a GUI Toolkit originally developed by the legendary _why.
res/why.png
Here's a bit of history:-

Way way back in the day, there was a guy named _why. He created a project known as Hackety Hack to teach programming to everyone. In order to reach all corners of the earth, _why decided to make Hackety Hack work on Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux. This was a lot of work, and so _why decided to share his toolkit with the world. Thus, Shoes was born.

Everybody loved Shoes. Many apps were made, and put into The Shoebox, which no longer exists. But, one day, _why left. In his memory, Team Shoes assembled, and carried on making Shoes. They released Shoes 3 in late summer 2010.
You can find more details about shoes at
http://shoesrb.com
Hmm!! So Who made Socks?
Why It was made by Sankha.
res/me.jpg
Psst! If you still can't identify him - He's the guy who always misses his flights! ;-)
Interesting! So How does it work?
Again, It's pretty simple! You just write a plain JSON File, and we take the pains of creating the presentation for you.
Whoa!! I get it now! :)
Ok! So who the heck are you? And why are you talking about it?
Ahh! I'm the friendly bugsmith, who likes this little tool and decided to talk about it!
res/sayak.png
If you want to know more about me, checkout my website: http://sayak.in
